title: Young Indians discover France with Elfe
para: About thirty young Indians from Mumbai spent two weeks in France during their training at Elfe.

title: Take part in our July tours!
para: Every month, Elfe offers many activities in Paris, every Friday at 1pm, after French classes. Discover the program of the month of July 2018…

title: Elfe celebrates francophonie’s week!
para: From March 17 to 25, it was the 23rd week of the French language and francophonie! On this occasion, Elfe proposed to his students a special day around the 5 senses and the 5 continents.

title: Elfe sets in Geneva
para: Created in 1984 in Paris, the school is now developing its international ambition by setting up in Geneva.

title: The program of activities for April has arrived!
para: Each month, we offer our students the opportunity to register for many workshops, visits or initiations allowing them to apply the learning seen in class.

title: The Collège de Paris moves to La Défense
para: By the end of the year, the Collège de Paris will open a campus in the Arche de La Défense. The four schools involved in this move – Ascencia Business School, l’Ecole Conte, Digital College et Ascencia Sport.
